text: Antonio Bucciero (born 29 April 1982 in Naples) is an Italian former cyclist. ==Palmares== ;1999 :1st Grand Prix Rüebliland ;2000 :2nd Junior World Road Race Championships ;2001 :2nd Gran Premio Città di Felino ;2002 :1st Trofeo Franco Balestra :2nd Coppa San Geo ;2003 :2nd Trofeo Città di Castelfidardo ;2004 :1st Stage 1 Bayern Rundfahrt :2nd Philadelphia International Championship ;2006 :1st Gran Premio San Giuseppe :1st Trofeo Papà Cervi :2nd Trofeo Franco Balestra :2nd Coppa San Geo ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists
title: Antonio Bucciero
